alert.note: Alert for Lipscomb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 4:01AM CDT until August 07 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Beaver County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Northern Lipscomb County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 500 AM CDT. * At 401 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northwest of Elmwood, or 11 miles south of Beaver, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Follett, Darrouzett, Elmwood and Slapout. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
